attributes.action: Stop people from lip syncing to songs and uploading it to Snapchat.
attributes.additional_details: Evidence: every 14 year old on the planet with access to a smartphone.
attributes.background: Multiple young people are lip syncing to songs and uploading the ridiculous clips for the world to see. It’s an embarrassment to our nation and our youth and it’s torture to the eyes of the people who have to see it.
